name: Caipora, a Guardiã das Florestas
description:
Caipora, Guardiã das Florestas was a project developed during the Digital Games course at Faculdade Impacta in the OPE (Project for Company Workshop) discipline. The game tells a new story of Caipora in a world destroyed by man's actions.

Sobre o jogo

Caipora, a Guardiã das Florestas foi um projeto desenvolvido durante o curso de Jogos Digitais da Faculdade Impacta na disciplina OPE (Oficina de Projeto para Empresa). O jogo conta uma nova história da Caipora em um mundo destruído pelas ações do homem.

How to install the game

1- You can download the file "Caipora install.exe" and when you run it you will start the installation of the game, follow the instructions that will be shown and at the end a shortcut of the game will appear on your desktop. To uninstall the game, just go to the folder where the game was installed and click on the “Uninstal” file.

2- You can also choose to download the game's build in the file “Caipora, the Guardian of Forests.rar”. Choosing this method you will have to unzip the files using your preferred software, after this step look in the unzipped folder for a file called “Caipora, the Forest Guardian”, this is the file that runs the game.

People who made the game and their roles

Théo Fazion dos Santos: Programmer (Unity), Game Design and Level Design.

Augusto Oscar Lopes: Scenarios and interface.

Thiago Yuri Pereira Barbosa: Character Design and 2D Animator.
